position: Brand & Email Marketing Strategist | Helping businesses stand out online!

experience.title: Email Marketing Specialist
experience.description: As the Email Marketing Strategist at RPM, I'm responsible for developing and executing email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, acquisition, retention, and revenue for our clients. As a strategic thinker who is passionate about email marketing and has a deep understanding of how to leverage data and analytics to drive results, I have assisted in growing their current client's ROI.Key Responsibilities:• Develop and execute email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, acquisition, retention, and revenue for our clients.• Develop and maintain email marketing calendars and ensure that campaigns are executed on time and on budget.• Develop and implement A/B testing strategies to continuously improve campaign performance.• Monitor and analyze campaign performance data to identify opportunities for improvement and communicate insights to clients.• Develop and maintain relationships with clients to understand their business goals and objectives.• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to ensure that our email marketing strategies are innovative and effective.Qualifications:• 3+ years of experience in email marketing.• Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and reporting.• Experience with marketing automation platforms (e.g. HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot, etc.).• Strong written and verbal communication skills.• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.• Experience working with clients in a fast-paced agency environment.• Passion for email marketing and a desire to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.
experience.description_html: As the Email Marketing Strategist at RPM, I'm responsible for developing and executing email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, acquisition, retention, and revenue for our clients. As a strategic thinker who is passionate about email marketing and has a deep understanding of how to leverage data and analytics to drive results, I have assisted in growing their current client's ROI.Key Responsibilities:• Develop and execute email marketing campaigns that drive engagement, acquisition, retention, and revenue for our clients.• Develop and maintain email marketing calendars and ensure that campaigns are executed on time and on budget.• Develop and implement A/B testing strategies to continuously improve campaign performance.• Monitor and analyze campaign performance data to identify opportunities for improvement and communicate insights to clients.• Develop and maintain relationships with clients to understand their business goals and objectives.• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to ensure that our email marketing strategies are innovative and effective.Qualifications:• 3+ years of experience in email marketing.• Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and reporting.• Experience with marketing automation platforms (e.g. HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot, etc.).• Strong written and verbal communication skills.• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.• Experience working with clients in a fast-paced agency environment.• Passion for email marketing and a desire to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.

experience.title: Self Employed
experience.description: Can-Designz specializes in Embroidery and Heat Transfer branding.Specialities consist of:Promotional eventsTeam building eventsCompany logo'sSchool eventsBridal packagesBaby shower packagesPersonalized newborn wareCouple's printsSafety ware (reflective vinyl)Personalized printsClothing printed on:-Satin/Cotton robesBridal sashesT-shirtsGolfersHoodiesSweatshirts/PulloversVestsDenimIndustrial jacket and pants setsBaby growersOnesies etc.As of recently, we have introduced "sticker vinyl" as one of our services rendered. This can be applied to basically any hard and dry surface. One of the attractions, is the customizing of souvenirs and wedding apparel.Prices vary according to size and artwork. Orders are processed once quotes are approved.

experience.title: Pharmacy Clerk
experience.description: Ensuring that staff are motivated and trained according to their abilities. Responsible for making sure that any gaps in performance or protocols are quickly identified and rectified. Producing accurate reports of the turnaround performance of the hospital systems. Accurately charging of medical procedures.Responsibilities consisted of:Charging on IMEDS, Stock Control (Hospital) and InfoquestOrdering of surgical stock (primarily prosthetic stock)Managing the process of back ordersLiaising with Life Healthcare Head Office regarding product complaintsReceipting of invoices – Prosthesis, Surgical and EthicalBilling of prosthesis to patientProcessing inter-hospital and in-hospital transfersResolving medical aid queriesData capturingMaintaining CAPS Report (Finance)Stock auditsResolving stock varianceProcessing month end reportsManaging the process of new and improved stock to be loaded onto the hospital systemTraining staff on Impilo, Infoquest, Stock Control (hospital systems)Motivating for new stock to be loaded as formularyLiaising with medical aid personnel regarding patient limitsManaging the process of accurate billing of patient limits
